pageContext.title: Music Theatre Online
pageContext.description_excerpt: Music Theatre Online, based at the Maryland Institute for Technology in the Humanities, is a digital archive of texts, images, video, and audio files relating to musical theater. The best printed editions of musical theater texts cannot fully provide the experience of simultaneous expression of verbal, musical, and terpsichorean languages so necessary to fully understand the art form. Using the multimedia capabilities of the modern web browser, we created a better framework for studying these important works of drama.
pageContext.participants: Doug Reside, Elisabeth Kvernen, Jennifer Guiliano
